Directly download the Chadwick Bureau's public register of baseball players and the various IDs associated with them in different systems of record.

Source: R/get_chadwick_lu.R
get_chadwick_lu.Rd

Directly download the Chadwick Bureau's public register of baseball players and the various IDs associated with them in different systems of record.

get_chadwick_lu()

Examples

get_chadwick_lu()
